name: SAVC Orchestrator
description: SAVC orchestration tools for routing, decomposition, expert spawning, voice-call bridge, and image generation.

savcCorePath.label: SAVC Core Path
savcCorePath.help: Absolute or relative path to savc-core directory.

agentsDir.label: Agents Dir
agentsDir.help: Optional override for agent YAML directory.

spawnMode.label: Spawn Mode
spawnMode.help: Execution backend for savc_spawn_expert. Default is mock; set to real to use OpenClaw session tools.

defaultWait.label: Wait By Default
defaultWait.help: Whether savc_spawn_expert waits for completion by default.

defaultTimeoutMs.label: Default Timeout (ms)
defaultTimeoutMs.help: Default timeout used by spawn/wait operations.

memoryRecallEnabled.label: Enable Memory Recall
memoryRecallEnabled.help: Recall semantic memories before expert execution.

memoryRecallTopK.label: Recall TopK
memoryRecallTopK.help: Maximum number of recalled memories injected into task.

memoryMinScore.label: Recall Min Score
memoryMinScore.help: Minimum semantic similarity threshold for recalled memories.

memoryPersistEnabled.label: Enable Memory Persist
memoryPersistEnabled.help: Allow memory agent branch to persist semantic memory.
